verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Bb
When I feel the touch
Of His hand upon my life,
It causes me to sing this song
That I love You Lord.
So from deep within
My spirit singeth unto Thee,
You are my King, You are my God,
And I love You Lord.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Lord, I love You!
Lord, I love You!
Lord, I love You!
I love You, Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, we praise You!
Lord, we praise You!
Lord, we praise You!
We praise You, Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, we love You!
Lord, we love You!
Lord, we love You!
We love You, Lord!
